channel.title: Server only accepting one client, not any others problem
channel.description: A server i'm trying to use for some stuff will not allow me to collect with any other client besides their main one. How do I change it so the server accepts any?

item.title: Server only accepting one client, not any others problem
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

It’s something to do with some kind of wrong id sending or maybe if the server is only accepting certain client ids. I really just need to know where to check this. Its a PI source btw.

Read full topic
item.source: Server only accepting one client, not any others problem

item.title: Server only accepting one client, not any others problem
item.dc:creator: @Zoft1 Zoft™
item.description:
@Zoft1 wrote:

Usually this has something to do with the UID the clients send upon connecting.

Read full topic
